#summary Tigra joystick test module.

= Introduction =

This module should help test Tigra robot using joystick.

= Details =

Utility performs sending control data throw XBee Pro whireless network to Tigra robot.
Using this utility you can easy test your 'Tigra' robot.

= Example: =

http://roboticsby.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/images/tigra_robot_test_utility_screen.png
